entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
